Q0: BRCA1/BRCA2 genetic testing (hereditary breast and ovarian cancer panel).
Q17: To submit the claim, provide detailed documentation of the patient's family cancer history, the genetic counselor’s risk assessment and recommendation, and clinical notes on how the results will guide management. Ensure prior authorization is obtained if required. Submit the claim with the appropriate CPT codes (81211, 81213) and supporting documentation as per Aetna’s policy.
